price: (29) So remind, [O Muḥammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
